Title: The.Community.Map
Description: The.Community,Map is a participative online GIS system build on Microsoft Silverlight, WPF and the Virtual Earth control. It uses WCF for server communication and SQL Server 2008 as the spatial information storage database.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The.Community,Map is a participative online GIS system build on Microsoft Silverlight, WPF and the Virtual Earth control. It uses WCF for server communication and SQL Server 2008 as the spatial information storage database.
